one_reviews_text:
Gameboard racing with arcade shooting is sooo much fun! This game is surprisingly fun. I bought it on a whim without expectations. I now play it more than all the AAA stuff out there.

Thing is... I rarely boot up the rift now that the quest 2 is out. 

I'd gladly pay again (or even double) to get this on my quest. It's perfect for that device.

review_title: Great game,  but I need friend add me
one_reviews_text: This game is great but i need friend for party time. Please add me

This game is so fun to play, only wish multiplayer had a couple people playing. Should really consider adding it to steam and maybe support non VR. I think they could make it work. LOVE IT THO!

EDIT: Its already on steam lol does the multiplayer not work with steam??
This title was one of the reasons I bought a Oculus Go. Now it needs to go on quest. What’s the hold up? At least make it backwards compatible.

review_title: WHY IS THIS NOT ON THE QUEST?????
one_reviews_text: Seriously, These guys must hate money. This wouldve sold like crazy in the early days. An i would definitely rebuy this if it wasnt cross buy

Pretty decent/fun little non-VR game that can be played with friends.  The VR doesn't really add much of anything to the experience though, like watching a game on a 3D monitor but not real VR.  Still ok for a sale price.

review_title: FIX FOR "PRESS A TO CONTINUE BUG"
one_reviews_text: When you're stuck at the startup screen with the message "Press A to continue" it was not working with the touch controllers. Turns out (after much frustration), it was reading my PS4 controller that was plugged in as the primary device. Pressed "x" on the controller and sure enough it went to the next screen. From there, I just unplugged the controller and went back to touch controls and it worked fine. Love the game! Annoying bug, hope this helps anyone with similar struggles.

review_title: Great game to get you introduced to VR
one_reviews_text: This is a great game for new VR enthusiasts. It is one of the first games i purchased when i got my rift a couple years ago and i still go back to this game and play. It reminds me of rock and roll racing for super nintendo which i loved.

I bought this game a while back after one of their free weekends because it was a lot of fun. There were several lobbies of people to play with and voice chat made it even more fun. It is like they took a post apocalyptic Mario Kart style racing and put it on Micro Machines and brought it to VR. It reminds me a lot of the old game RC Pro-AM for Nintendo. However, after that free weekend the lobbies were few and far between. If you were lucky to find one with international players, the lag was game breaking. The game is still fun, but after you get through the campaign, the only replay is with other people, if there are any online. It also seems like they made one last update and abandoned it.

Audio only works if Windows default is the RIft S and the game is on top of any other windows.
Love this game! Great racer without motion sickness. Please port this to the quest!!

review_title: A wonderful way to play a classic game
one_reviews_text: Blaze Rush is already a strong game, but it becomes truly special in VR. There's something so novel and fun about playing a standard top-down racer in the Rift. The cars feel like toys. You can lean into the racetrack and weave around cars and obstacles. Blaze Rush ends up being so funky and so enjoyable.

Another game that is a waste of money. You are not racing from inside the car rather you are racing like a kid looking down at one of the TYCO racing tracks they used to sell in the 70's. Yet another game I wish I could get my money back for.

stunning visuals, smooth and great to play.

love every bit. just like the old micro machines in vr!

Translation from portuguese to english! PLAISE:The game it self is great and addictive, note 10, everything in the game is great from start to finish of a match! Working with windows 10 was almot perfect! Well, I already had this game on Steam, and it was 99% of the VR games that worked with w 10 and only this specific game with windows 7, and it was horrible to have to change the operating system at every invitation from a good opponent! Now it´s almost perfect! Well, from here, I descrive the bad part of this game! Bad part about the game is the lag (dlay, slowness) when palying with people from other contries! PLAYING PART OF THIS game:YOU CAN NOT PLAY WITH THE FRIENDS of Steam that have this same game! Note:Many of the good players in this game (BlazeRush) do not have oculus VR, but they are gret opponents. And if you enter to play online (version sold on Steam) 10 times, at least 06 times, has opponents to compete. Well, as important as having a good game are the opponents to compete! With the new version (sold by Oculus) has the good part of working with the W 10, BUT, when entering to play online 10 times, 10 times there is no one to play! Morl of the story:even with an oculus CV1, I still keep changing system and making use of the DK2. My favorite game now works with W 10, BUT, without Steam´s friends to play and no other oppoents too! Well, the online game (of ocuus rift), more like a desert, we rarely find someone playing online! That is, new version to work  with Windows 10 almost perfect!
Takes me to Micro machines on my Amiga but you are actually there bside the track.  My favourite track at the moment is the one with the big roller chasing you. Just great fun.

This game is awesome for VR! Got me to really enjoy VR again and put back on the headset daily.  I used an XBox controller which is perfect for this type of game and works flawlessly. It is a sit down game and the learning curve is casual and progressive. Beautiful graphics, fun, fun, fun gameplay!!
For the price, can't go wrong.
Please give us more.
Fun playing the game

"Its a childhood dream come true!"; I showed the game to one of my mates recently and these were his exact words. The videos of this game do not do it justice, seeng it in actual vr and being able to see the "rubber" on the car wheels or feel the suspension as the chassis rocks from side to side is amazing. Had a few online plays where I was just giggling at silly "takedowns". Fun game
nice game
Love it! It reminds me of being a kid and playing with matchbox cars. So fun. We need more games like this.
Good

Never heard of this game, bought in on sale for 3 euros because of the good reviews and ... this is so fun !! THIS IS SO MUCH FUN !

It reminds me of old games I use to play when I was young with some friends and family. But the VR is soooo freakin coool ! You really feel like you are playing with real tiny toys just in front of you, you could almost touch them, and it's so much fun. It is not even ugly, races by night are visually incredible !!! 
It's in sale, go for it without even thinking ! And if you missed the sale, it's still worth the full price !

review_title: This Game is not starting still
one_reviews_text: Please reply to me why still this game not starting, please let me know will provide my oculus id, so you can get in touch with me

All modes except maybe the racing mode is great fun to play and blaze bowl is hectic as hell but if all u want is to race then i'd say stick with the king of the hill mode the normal racing gets defeated by its catchup mechanics meaning all that matters is the last little bit before the end on the last lap but all other modes are GREAT FUN

review_title: Great in VR and in 2D coop
one_reviews_text: I tried the VR and am really impressed with it. It is great fun to play in VR. I am extra impressed with the fact that you can also switch to 2D if you disable the HMD and run directly from the .exe. I just played a good few games with the misses. Now that she is busy I will switch back to VR mode. Best of both worlds.

It's an amazing little game with over the top mechanics and 
endless hours of fun for me, I am addicted, well worth the money.

In VR this game is so enjoyable! Bought it on sale but for me it's propably more fun than other expensive titles. The controls are very simple but well done. Buy it, especially if it's on sale! The 3 Euro are well invested.

Oculus touch not working with this game - why? Do I something wrong?
I play on keyboard only (no have gamepad). But this game in VR is the best race ever. (top view of course).
Never loads. Can't even start the game.

I used to play similar games with my friends in the nineties. The four of us were crammed over a single keyboard to control our vehicles. Good times.

I wish I could go back in time and show my friends this game. They would be blown away. The single player alone was a lot of fun with all the explosions and constant action. VR really makes this game come to life with stuff flying to your face etc. Brilliant. 

Worth it for the regular price, but on sale this game is a steal. I feel like I should have paid more. :)
Greate game. I remember the good old days with my SNES and Rock'n'Roll-Racing. And now in VR. It has potential for more...

review_title: I dont know who these Jokers are!
one_reviews_text: But they were spot on with this little gem. Its quite fun in a slightly limited (by its nostalgic genre only) sort of way. Worth the minor sum they are asking for though!! IT IS FUN! Get in here!
Just another great example of how you can experience VR in a unique way. Great game!

This is like Mario Kart in VR, I had a blast for hours and have only played it a couple times. Private multiplayer hosting is a little flaky but my friends joined a public room w/o any problem and playing against others isn't annoying since I never noticed any voice chat. Lots of fun game modes, cars, and power ups keep it interesting.  Well worth the cost!
Yes please. This game needs to get huge. Freaking amazing game.

This game is a blast. Nice throw-back to my nights playing Rock'n Roll Racing, and this game is so much better. The animations are fun, the racing is non-stop action, explosions, etc. and the game mechanics are well tweaked to make it not too easy and not too hard. Shame that the public servers are always empty, I've never found anyone to play this with.

VR "only" adds a fun 3d view for this kind of game,  (it looks like everything you were dreaming, when you were a little boy laying on the floor of your room, and playing littles cars) BUT the game is fun, with no bug. Sooo, thanks to devs, and ENJOY ! :-)

review_title: Fun game marred by terrible choices.
one_reviews_text: If you have to pick up my car and move it forward on the track when im pressing the gas flat out, there is a problem with the game design. There are times when it teleports me 5 times in a row and there is NOTHING i can do about it. It even teleports me over drops that would allow me to go fast enough to stop the teleporting. I just cant get over how bad this is.

Reminds me of my snes days when i was a kid playing Rock´n´Roll Racing.This game is really cool and it´s real fun play. Sadly i don´t have sound in the game. 5 stars if this is fixed. I read that someone else got this prob and i can hear unlock sounds as well, but nothing else. So what´s the prob?

This is the first VR game I completed. It convinced me that touch controllers and room scale aren't essential for an excellent game.

Graphics and physics are spot on. And look fantastic when supersampled.

Heaps of levels, good boss battles, lots of interesting gameplay mechanics to balance. 

I would say this is a must have, but I'm nostalgic for this type of Rock'n'Roll racing/ Micromachines type of game from my Mega Drive days.
Nice!!

Works great with Touch controllers as gamepad. If such games existed when I was a kid I'd have used all my quarters in minutes ;-) The game is like Super Sprint on mega-steroids, what's not to like? Works perfectly with supersampling set to 2 using GTX 1080.
I don't have any problems with Touch. The game works great and is a lot of fun! It's nice to have a game in my library that is not yet another first person shooter/puzzler. I give it 4,5.

It says it supports Touch as gamepad but thats not true. When game is loaded it asks you to calibrate your rift by pressing on buttons and also to press A but none of the buttons on Touch devices responds so you cant start the game. Should be a easy fix but developer know about this issue because many have complained but nothing happens. So that 10 $ down the drain.
Rock & Roll Racing in VR! Pure Nostalgia!

This game is basically pure unadultered fun. It's like Micromachines, but with entertaining weapons to blast your opponents off the track. You find yourself laughing constantly even when it's you that has been knocked off. The physics feel great screeching round corners, the main PvP mode keeps respawning your cars to keep the whole race interesting, and the isometric god view over the race track works brillintly in VR. Very glad I found this as it wasn't the sort of game I was expecting to be so great in VR!

PS The store page video shows a game mode that looks like Rocket League Blood Bowl and it is pretty good, but the racing mode on tracks with opponents and a giant crushing monster truck chasing you all down is much more fun for me!

review_title: It's a good game and VR is a nice bonus.
one_reviews_text: Like a pinball game. This is good game even without VR but it's a nice feature and adds cool factor.
Reminds me of Rock n Roll racing.  Had no problems with touch controls, feels great!

review_title: not the runt of the litter!
one_reviews_text: Wrote this game off as part of the Pack 1 collection offer but its turned out to be a surprising gem! Glad to have something different in my collection of VR games. Micro machines meet rocket league.

Fantastic game, so much fun, with non-stop hilarious action, well worth the price. Me and a friend just bought this today, can play with up to 8, so if you wanna join us sometime, feel free to add me :)
Love this game! Treat yourself to some old school fun and just get it already!!!!

review_title: Epic Kind of Rock n Roll Racing!
one_reviews_text: Best of Micromachines and Rock n Roll Racing but in VR and some good new Ideas :)

From the video, I thought this game was like Rocket League in VR.  But nope, it's more like Mad Max meets roided up Hot Wheels.  It's a battle royale race to the finish line.  You get powerups if you're behind to get a leg up on the competition.  Definitely recommend playing this game on Xbox controller versus anything else so you can pinpoint drive around the tight curves.  Boost your way past enemies or blow them up.  Multiplayer is frantic and anything can happen.  The difficulty curve is actually not steep at all, once you get the hang of driving (it took me a few races to get "it").  But there's a lot of strategy in knowing when to use powerups and how to defend yourself.  Definite must buy at sale price of $5.
Why does it not recognize my oculus remote/touch? Cannot play this game. :/ wish I can refund
This is a gem of a game. The graphics are good, the physics are tight, and the play is fun. Well worth the price of admission.

review_title: It doesn't recognize my Touch Controller
one_reviews_text:
It either locks up at the "Press A to continue" screen or it doesn't recognize my touch contollers. Is there a workaround for this or am I going to have to refund?

I would rather have the workaround. Any help would be appreciated. Thanks. 

UPDATE: Workaround - Buy a MS Wireless XBox One Contoller
I think once in the game you can select the touch contollers.

Updating my review (now that I can play it)

The others have said it all. Very fun and exciting game. I played against bots for the first 3 races... and lost them all in the final stretch. I'm sure I'll get better as I play. It looks great in VR and plays without any problems. Have fun.
Cool game. Very fun in short bursts and the physics are good. Recommended.

Before buying i was wondering why tf this game exists in VR. I bought it on sale because i red the good reviews and i though lets give it a shot. Now that i have played i want to shout: WHY TF THIS GAME EXISTS IN VR??? Im not saying this game sucks im just saying this game should only be played in your playstation/xbox.  I payed 2 euros for the game and now im sad because i should have payed 0,5 the most... If you enter VR just so you can play this game then im sad for you, because you obviously have no idea what VR was made for. And this is not it
The game asks me to start with the "A" button, but when doing so nothing happens.

review_title: It's like RC car racing in real life
one_reviews_text: Imagine your touch controllers being the controller of an RC car and you are trying to get to the finish line, but there are power ups along the way like mario kart. You get nitro boosts and weapons to knock your opponents off the track.There are about 20 cars with different styles (faster, harder to kill, etc) that you earn from racing.  Racing online is quick and you can jump right into one in mere seconds, and there is also campaign mode that is sort of like training.  the football is a new mode i haven't tried. It's awesome and I really wish they would make expansion packs or a blazerush 2.
I actually felt like i got my monies worth here  and dont' feel ripped off! :)

System playback device must be set to "rift audio" before starting to the game for the sound to work.  Touch controllers don't work when trying to control the cars.  You better have an gamepad controller or you'll have to figure it out with a keyboard, because the touch controllers don't seem to be supported.
Just posting this to say I haven't had a single problem playing with touch controllers, since some earlier reviews are complaining about it. Also, good game.

review_title: Loads Of Fun For The Price!
one_reviews_text: Fun concept! It's like Landfall meets Twisted Metal! Besides, $10 bucks is not bad at all for what you get with this game!
This game for the price is a no brainer so much more untapped potential in there. I hope the devs crank out new features but is great game as it stands

Plz fix.
It says on the store page that we can use them,but we cannot.
I will fix the star rateing once they are fixed.
btw good game not great but good.

review_title: Very fun and with great singleplayer
one_reviews_text: Very fun game. Reminds the old snes classics

It's a fun game.  I've come to it late, but there are still 'vets' that play this.  The addition of comms makes a huge difference, like most VR games imo.  It's always a laugh, good banter and it doesn't take long to become competitive.

If you like Mashed/Blur/Micro Machines, then get this game.  For the price, it's a no-brainer.

review_title: More fun than it should be.
one_reviews_text: If this was on a normal monitor it would be an ok game. But VR makes this feel like the cars are racing around in front of you, it makes the races more intense and it makes it all the more painful when you get knocked off the side of the track at the last second after clawing back the lead. I'd recommend this to any VR owner, they will come to love it as I have.

It would be a funny game, but it's the only game with no sound. What's the problem? I'm the only one with this problem. No Problems with other games! So, it's not funny to play this game without sound!

Just the sort of game I've been after, camera angles are spot on too as you move around.  I've found though, if you crouch right down in your seat and then recenter using the 2 thumbsticks, it gives you a better view when you sit back up and you can see more rather than it being at eye level.  Definately worth the £4
This game is awesome! Easy to play but takes a while to master.  If the Rift only had this game, it would probably still be worth the $$.

Bought it because it was cheap but was very surprised how brilliant it is. Sort of like remote control car but 100X better. Great smooth graphics. Lots of fun. Great the way it takes you through your learning curve. You get better at it in no time. Highly recommend.

I installed the free weekend version just to see what it was.. it was free after all. :D 

3 hours later i took the Rift headset off.. 
this is a FUN FUN game.. great way to undwind and let off steam.. 

think micro machines meets mario kart

review_title: Rad, like playing with toys for real :D
one_reviews_text: Played the free weekend and bought it within 20 minutes. Would have been sooner but I had to stop to pee and didn't want to quit playing lol. This and Landfall are perfect games to me. It's like playing with your toys but they come to life haha

review_title: One of my Favorites!  Very fun!!
one_reviews_text: I tried this game during the "free play" weekend and bought it immediately.  This is one of my top 2 favorite games for VR!  It has both a solo mode, as well as multiplayer.  The best part of the game is the multiplayer mode.  There are several multiplayer game modes, different mades, amazing weapons, and much more!  This game has very high replay value and I highly recommend it!

review_title: Way more fun than I expected
one_reviews_text: Racing games aren't typically my thing, but for a free preview weekend, I'll try anything. My first thought was, "It's not a first-person view? How disappointing." Then I played my first race. And my second, third, fourth.... This game is a ridiculous amount of fun and a must-buy at the sale price of $5.

100% recommendation. Playing on the Vive via revive and it works perfekt. This is a game you need. The videos don´t do it justice. Its like controlling little matchbox toy cars with awesome physics. get it!

It's addictive, a little repetative but the variety makes up for too much repetition.  The gameplay can be a lot of fun and challenging, the VR perspective is pretty cool.  At first I was totally apprehensive to the game.  Truth be told, the fact that they allowed it to be free for a couple of days lured me in.  Then they brought the price down to $4.99.  I felt with the amount I played I had to support the lower cost at a least.  The game is really worth $15.00 at least.  I would pay another $20-$30 additional for an add-on that allowed me to jump into the car first person.  That would be crazy fun.  Also, when passing the cars you would see the characters face   in sync with multiplayer movements.   Touch controllers could be used to steer the car.  Just another level to the game. WOW.  Anyway.  Great Job!

5.00 sale price or the 10.00 original asking price, after the first training session I went ahead and got the game. The controls are simplistic, the vehicles look like little RC cars, the camera angle is perfect. I felt like a kid at an RC park. I am having an issue with having no sound in the game, its fun muted, but Im sure it'd be even better with music.

this game is amazing. just go play it.
soooooo addicted, if i loose my job, its because of this game.

Support the Oculus trend of doing Free play weekends! Game is worth $5. It might get stale after a bit, but I played for 2 hours already. That alone makes it worth the money. 

As for the modes, Death Race is probably the best, then Rocket League one. Regular race is meh, as is King of the "Hill" (points for being in first longest). 
They should implement a straight up Death Match mode! - Just saying.

Only 2 critiques. 1. There's a consistant audio issue where some snippet of mic audio just gets on a loop. 2. What do I do with all these points I "win" for matches?

review_title: Fun but a bit too random
one_reviews_text: The game is a lot of fun however can feel a bit too chaotic and relies too much on luck when getting the power ups. Multiplayer is awesome but remains to be seen if there are enough players once the free weekend is over. Still, definitely worth the $5 price.

I'm not usyally one to write reviews on every title I play. This game stands out. It's a total steal at about $5. Tons of fun,  awesome graphics and immersion. Add it to your collection before the devs realize it's underpriced.

After several games in career I was hooked.  It has the same Landfall feel but with my favorite element of battle racing.  Just watching the trailer serves no justice.  It has to be played to realize just how fun and addictive this amazing game is.
Tried it for free, ended up buying it. It's great fun, racing, guns, rockets, sticky goo. It's just madness. For the price it's worth every penny. Can't see myself getting bored with this quickly.

Gave it a shot during the free trial and it exceeded my expectations. If you are in the market for a fun inexpensive VR go-kart mayhem then look no further. Take advantage of the sale. 2 thumbs way up!!!

review_title: Most played VR game in my library
one_reviews_text: This is by far the most played game I own (out of 50+ titles). It is a must have for multiplayer action in VR. Hopefully the FREE weekend will convince others to join the party.

I am using a gamepad, the one that comes with the Oculus Rift, and the vehicle spins out constantly. Standard driving games use trigger as gas and direction pad to steer. Not the case with this game. It makes you use the direction pad as gas, brake, and steering. So now you have 4 buttons for boost, and 4 buttons for your weapon. It also automatically added a 2nd player, using the keyboard, when I am playing solo. Could not find a way to remove 2nd player from game. Wish there was a way to customize the gamepad to work properly, button placement, sensitivity. I was hoping for an RC Pro AM, or Rock 'N' Roll Racing but what I have is a waste of money!

Tried it for free, when the free time expired i rushed myself to the store again to buy it.
Besides the shooting zombies finally a smoothly running racing game which is very easy to play for long hours of fun.
After doing a few of the single player career races, I thought the game was cute and worth the $5 sale price.  After playing a multiplayer football match, I threw my money at it.
I was trying to "try it" on the free weekend, but accidentally bought it.  Happy I did.  If you liked Rock and Roll Racing (from the SNES days), you'll enjoy this.

review_title: Game worth more than what it is priced
one_reviews_text: Love the game ..even back in the DK2 days. Their is one minor bug with Voice Chat in that a half second of voice gets trapped in a loop and doesn't stop playing until you restart the game.
Its hard to find the software worth its price in the vr market. This game worth every penny and fun. As fun as mario kart. koodos to the developers. hope they update some maps
This is an amazing game that just happens to be a lot of fun to play in VR.  It's the game that I imagined I'd play one day when I used to play RC Pro-Am on my NES.
Fun concept, cool looking graphics, multiplayer is fun and the physics are great. no motion sickness after 1h gameplay. :D
It's a quite long and very fun game, with a lot of variety in maps to race on! the loading time is instant! so overall it's a perfect 10
Tried on free weekend and fell in love, thanks oculus. Ended up buying while on sale. Great game anyone can play. :D
This game is simple, fun and addictive. Love the cartoony physics and the detailed modeling of the cars and environment. Awesome game.

I had a SEGA Megadrive years ago and loved playing Micro Machines. This reminds me a lot of that :) So much fun!

A must buy!

review_title: No local coop in this version playable
one_reviews_text: Though you are able to add other players as in the original 2D-game-version the other players only get to see the view of the one playing with the HMD on the monitor. So they cannot see where their racers are moving. This is unfortunate as it works in other games like mass exodus and the 2D-Version offers a view for local coop, too. Would have been a blast as a local coop partygame and it is what is expected knowing the original version and reading the description.
loads of fun! especially in multiplayer with friends. Congrats devs! you have a winner here.
Purchased this game yet?
Graphics are awesome, controls are great and multiplayer is friggen sweet.  Love it.
INCREDIBLY Fun. Worth the $5 AND MORE! What can I say other than it's an awesome game! GET IT!
5 stars for making my top 5 favorite VR titles. Fun and extremely addictive!!!
I haven't had this much fun since the days of Super Offroad and Rock n' Roll Racing.
Micromachines-like game in VR. Delivers what it sets out to do! :)
Wow, I didn't expect that it was this fun! And graphics is great.. Get it!
Lots of single player content and plenty more in multiplayer.

Don't pass on this game if you liked RC Pro AM, Super OffRoad or Rock n Roll Racing. I initially skipped this game because of middle  of the road metacritic reviews, but this game is one of the best of the genre. It's so addicitive and looks like playing with toy cars in VR!
Rock n' Roll Racing in VR. Very fun!!
Haven't laughed so much in ages... perfect!
Just buy it, it's awesome.
A loots of fun!!!
Could you please make an  american football game with the view this game uses? It would be awesome to have a madden or an all new football game. It would bring an all new way to play football.
This game is some of the most fun I have had in VR to date. It's cheap, good amount of content, and uses so little resources to run at max settings!

Great game, the vehicle variety, the power-ups and the game modes mean there's a lot to enjoy...and I haven't even made it through to the multiplayer yet, been having too much fun in the single player. A very well designed game (love the vehicle models!) and a lot of fun, definitely recommended.
One of the best gamepad games on OH.  Fairly long campaign and great multiplayer - just wish more people played.  Can't go wrong for $10, definitely worth it!

Pretty fun game!!  It's a "micro-machine" like multiplayer game that has many game modes: racing, football, King of the Hill, etc...
Also looks pretty darn good. 
-- Only Con:  I wish multiplayer had more players; but w/ increased purchases should come an increased player base.
Awesome game!

A great little game for the price, and a good recent update too. Would like some more track though. If you search 'GametechUK' on Youtube you will see i have reviewed this and many other VR games for the Oculus, might be worth having a look before you purchase?
Finally a game with a REAL solo mode. Amazing gameplay, very funny multiplayer.
loved it more than anything we got, and we purhased almost allgames until 2017. it would be most apprceiated to have touch controls supported in here.

The game displays and works on the computer just fine, but nothing displays on the headset. Using Alt-Tab or clicking on the window didn't fix this problem. I am waiting for this problem to be fixed.

Update: The game works now.
Good game ..glad the updated...works great on my Vive  with revive

I've played this game since the release of the Rift, and it was great (maybe 4 stars) already then. But after the big update with the added voice chat and the mode BlazeBowl, it really got alot better. The multiplayer is absolutely fantastic in every kind of way. The matches starts fast, all the cars have their own unique "feel", and all the people I've met through the game are all great, behave and laugh with and compliment each other.

The VR works perfectly for this game, and it's the only game to date where I have reached out my hand to catch a falling football or a car. I love the physics in the game. The cars have these little detail that they are always moving/bouncing, so they look really alive and at the same time toy-like. Only in a positive way.

I can only come up with one thing that can be get a little bit of critic, and it's the music. It's actually okey, but I much prefer to use the playlist of the classic SNES game Rock N' Roll Racing in the background while I play BlazeRush.

BlazeRush is for me one of the best games in multiplayer, and yes, I'm considering all the platforms out there. Ever. Fantastic!

Watching the small cars drive right in front of you, or see them explode/crash towards you is surprisingly amazing. Sadly, it doesnt seem like lots of people are playing it, so wait time can be long and players are rare. Really if you have a few bucks to spare, go get it and make it great again!

When I first got my Rift, I made the mistake of thinking Virtual Reality was purpose built just for First Person games.  Turns out 'Miniature' style games work out too!

This title is just plain fun.  Racing ala 'Rock n' Roll' racing or any number of 80s/90s arcade monster truck racing games, with a bit of frenetic and kinetic boosting and shooting.  Multiplayer with voice chat now is fantastic.  It's the title I keep coming back to.
Feels like a mash up between super off road, micro machines and a touch of mario kart! Just need more players online at a time for multiplayer.

review_title: If you don't own this sell your rift
one_reviews_text: Seriously one of the most fun titles around. It's everything you wish slot cars could have been when you were little. The simple immersion of it in VR adds way more than it has any right to. Explosions and debris flying towards your face, and even after countless hours playing I still expect to smell burnt rubber and oil every time it happens. The single player AI can get brutal towards the end of the single player content, but it never quite feels unfair. Overall 5/5. Should be purchased before you even install Lucky's Tale.

A lot of fun, the mutiplayer stadium football mode and "deathrace" are the most fun modes. It's cool seeing these tiny cars in front of you and the gameplay is something that makes you want to keep coming back.

The only downside is a lot of times there are hardly any players on (like 3 or 4 during slow time) depending on the time of day. Weekends are better it seems. So be prepared for that before you purchase.

This is the sleeper hit of the entire Oculus line up so far. It's a game you will keep coming back to again and again. Laugh out loud moments in multiplayer (do NOT miss the multiplayer!) and the devs are still adding content. DO NOT MISS THIS!

Great game which is like a mix of Micro Machines and Mario Kart.
Really fun and I didn't expect having so much fun. Great atmosphere in VR! Thanks for this great game!
This game is the vr version of Mario Kart and it looks great. The game is surprisingly long but repetitive but doesn't stop being fun. Definitely worth the cheap price.
Honestly, RC PRO AM in VR, you CAN"T go wrong!! VERY fun game !!!

Total blast of a game to play - seems so simple in 2D but in 3D (especially Death Race) it’s so much fun! I was laughing all night with a few buds as we tried to run away from that machine and its devastating grinder haha This game totally shocked me, the online servers get populated fast after playing a few rounds (if they say empty) and no, this isn’t a Rocket League clone so don’t get confused by the cover/media like I was. Happy I got it!
A high quality track racer with serious arsenal of types of weapons and boosts. Also very nice minuscule explosions.
Never knew I could enjoy third-person perspective racing this much. The most crazy fun comes from the American football multiplayer. I am so glad that I picked up this game.

Don't let the arcade looks fool you, this is a good little racer! The physics are really well done, the vehicles and tracks look great in VR and the gameplay delivers. This is one of my most satisfying Rift purchases to date.
this is a fantastic game ,great value .
Feels like a modern version of Ivan "Ironman" Stewart's Super Off Road or RC Pro-AM
I cannot say I have had a better VR experience than BlazeRush.  Single player can provide hours of fun and multiplayer is even better!
Nice little game.
Anyone who has a Oculus Rift must have this in their library. It feels like next gen Rock N Roll Racing. The gameplay is so fun and multiplayer is the best. Trust me buy this game!

review_title: It's Fun.  Like, Rocket League fun.
one_reviews_text: It's a simple game that provides simple fun.  Easy to come back to here and there for a quick few rounds.
I've gotten just addicted to this game as I did to Mario Kart back in the day.  The online multiplayer has gotten really competitive and BlazeBowl is a solid addition.

Non stop action. Endless fun. 

Con: Seems to have been abandoned by Targem. An update would be nice.

It is a lot of fun an makes you addicted very quickly. Singleplayer is challaging too, but multiplayer is where this game shines the most! Voice chat is awesome. The developer even added a great new game mode in a free update.

review_title: I can't get enough of this game
one_reviews_text: Single player is awesome by itself, but the multiplayer is also really fun.  The new BlazeBowl mode is alright, but the Death Race mode is a blast.

review_title: One of my MUST-HAVE VR games!
one_reviews_text:
So much fun. Action packed and huge replay value.

Never had this much adrenaline in a game in a while. Specially with the new football mode.
Easily the best purchase I have made on the oculus!
100% recommended

review_title: BlazeBowl update makes it even better!
one_reviews_text: One of the best multiplayer games on Rift got much better with the new arena brawling mode. Tons of laughs and lots of fun with groups!

review_title: The most fun to play VR game!
one_reviews_text: This game is simple one of the best and comfortable to play for me!
Awesome game! It gets the user a light VR experince to allow them to get comfortable with the feel, plus it is a fun game!
This is a must have game, soooo much fun! The new update makes it even better. Loving the voice chat!
This is probably the best party gameyou can play on Rift at the moment. So much fun to be had in the insane death matches!

Says the game is having trouble loading, take off rift headset and check on the computer. The game on the computer is fine but will never load on the headset. 
I wish I wouldn't have wasted my money on a game I can't even play!
